title: Cashier PT
info: My first every real job, which I really value because not only did it strengthen my communication skills, but it also taught me to handle challenging situation while adapting to a new environment.

title: Full-Stack Software Developer Intern
info: I spent 2 months of Summer 2024 with 7 other students building a website that resulted in me being proficient in tools like React.js, Node.js, SCSS and also gained knowledge of how Express.js worked with our backend - MongoDB.

title: Teaching Assistant
info: Following my successful Summer 2025 internship, I landed a Teaching Assistant role at my university, where I co-lead labs in a variety of courses to guide and assist students through their labs, and assignments, or any questions or concerns that they had.
